name: Sinjid
storyline: A Shinobi has been framed for the death of his master. After imprisonment for seven years, he is given one last chance to fight for his freedom. Will Sinjid survive the trail and find his master's true killer? Or will he perish?
summary:
Sinjid is the third game in the Sinjid series. It is a role-playing action-adventure game with real time battles made for flash. In this game, players take control of the eponymous protagonist, Sinjid and unfolds his story. 
 
Features: 
- Play as 3 different classes! 
- Action packed RPG adventure! 
- Over 300 items and equipment! 
- Nine epic zones to explore! 
- Nine epic bosses to defeat!
